alert.note: Alert for Osage; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 2:43PM CDT until May 26 at 11:23AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo affecting Tulsa County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek at Avant affecting Osage County. Bird Creek near Sperry affecting Osage and Tulsa Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bird Creek near Sperry. * WHEN...From this evening to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, minor rural flooding occurs from Skiatook to Turley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 23.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
